'''Bluecrown Finch''' is a type of bird that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Bluecrown finches can be found along the [[Aquabus]] line from [[Romaritime Harbor]] to the [[Belleau Region]], [[Fontaine]].
